Falstad.name: Hammerang
Falstad.description: Throw out a Hammer that returns to you, dealing 121 (+4% per level) damage and slowing enemies by 25% for 2 seconds.

Falstad.name: Lightning Rod
Falstad.description: Deal 107 (+4% per level) to an enemy, and an additional 75 (+4% per level) damage per second for 4.25 seconds if you remain close to the target.

Falstad.name: Barrel Roll
Falstad.description: Dashes forward and grants a 171 (+4% per level) point Shield for 3 seconds.

Falstad.name: Hinterland Blast
Falstad.description: After 1 second, deal 475 (+4.75% per level) damage to enemies within a long line. The cooldown is reduced by 25 seconds for every enemy Hero hit.

Falstad.name: Mighty Gust
Falstad.description: Push enemies away, and slow their Movement Speed by 40% decaying over 4 seconds.

Falstad.name: Tailwind
Falstad.description: Gain 15% increased Movement Speed after not taking damage for 6 seconds.

Falstad.name: Flight
Falstad.description: Instead of mounting, you can fly a great distance over terrain.

1.name: Gathering Storm
1.description: Quest: Every time Hammerang hits a Hero increase its damage by 1.5.

1.name: Seasoned Marksman
1.description: Quest: Every Minion killed near you grants 0.2 Attack Damage, and Takedowns grant 0.5 Attack Damage. Reward: Upon gaining 40 bonus Attack Damage, you can also activate Seasoned Marksman to increase your Attack Speed by 40% for 3 seconds. 60 second cooldown.

1.name: Wingman
1.description: Enemy Minions killed near Falstad grant a stack of Bribe. Falstad can use 20 stacks to bribe a Mercenary, instantly defeating them and permanently increasing the damage of Lightning Rod by 5%. Does not work on Bosses. Maximum of 80 stacks.

4.name: Hammer Gains
4.description: Basic Attacks heal for 20% of the damage dealt to the primary target.

4.name: Static Shield
4.description: Gain a Shield equal to 4% of Falstad's maximum Health after every Lightning Rod strike. Lasts 4 seconds and stacks.

4.name: Updraft
4.description: Increases Barrel Roll's range, Shield amount, and Shield duration by 40%.

7.name: BOOMerang
7.description: Reactivate Hammerang mid-flight to deal 165 (+4% per level) damage around the hammer.

7.name: Charged Up
7.description: Increases the number of Lightning Rod strikes by 2 and its range by 25%.

7.name: Secret Weapon
7.description: Increases Hammerang's range by 30% and Basic Attacks deal 60% bonus damage while Hammerang is in flight.

10.name: Hinterland Blast
10.description: After 1 second, deal 475 (+4.75% per level) damage to enemies within a long line. The cooldown is reduced by 25 seconds for every enemy Hero hit.

10.name: Mighty Gust
10.description: Push enemies away, and slow their Movement Speed by 40% decaying over 4 seconds.

13.name: Flow Rider
13.description: While Tailwind is active, your Basic Abilities recharge 100% faster.

13.name: Giant Killer
13.description: Basic Attacks against enemy Heroes deal bonus damage equal to 1.5% of the Hero's maximum Health.

13.name: Thunderstrikes
13.description: Lightning Rod deals 20% more damage each subsequent strike.

16.name: Aerie Gusts
16.description: Reduces the activation time for Tailwind from 6 to 3 seconds, and increases the Movement Speed bonus from 15% to 25%.

16.name: Afterburner
16.description: Barrel Roll increases Movement Speed by 60%, decaying over 3 seconds.

20.name: Call of the Wildhammer
20.description: Hinterland Blast has double the range and deals 25% more damage.

20.name: Epic Mount
20.description: Reduce the cooldown of Flight to 30 seconds, reduce the cast time before flying to 0.5 seconds, and increase the speed by 50%.

20.name: Nexus Frenzy
20.description: Increases Attack Speed by 20% and Attack Range by 1.1.

20.name: Wind Tunnel
20.description: Mighty Gust creates a wind tunnel for 4 seconds. Enemies caught in the tunnel will periodically be pushed back.
